import React, { useState, useNavigate } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export default function AddUser() { let navigate = useNavigate() const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: '', username: '', email: '' }) const { name, username, email } = user; const onInputChange = (e) => { setUser({ ...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() await axios.post("http://localhost:8080/users", user) navigate("/Home") } return (
